title: Keynote: Futnani on engaging superpowers in MENA and beyond - TXF
summary: HSBC's global co-head of export finance and head of Middle East, North Africa and Turkey infrastructure and asset finance, Manav Futnani, discusses the vital role of ECAs in supporting the energy transition, particularly in the Middle East region. He highlights the importance of ECAs in facilitating bankable deals for green projects, including green hydrogen, wind farms, and solar power. Futnani emphasizes the need for ECAs to modernize their offerings to better support the energy transition, including longer tenors and tailored repayment profiles.
product_or_process: ECA financing programs for green hydrogen, wind farms, and solar power
greenwashing: There is no indication of greenwashing in the article.
